text: Hey all — I’m super curious on who is buying or downloading theme packs from you? Is there a certain type of business? Certain Industry? Certain demograhpic? Do you have any of these details that you’d be willing to share? I’m super interested in the people downloading full themes for free or pay and would like to know if you would share some information with me!
Hi there! Has anybody changed the name of their business or brand after being listed in the App Marketplace? I'm trying to understand if it is possible and, if so, what the process looks like.
